mosinstall.name: CB Superthumb
mosinstall.author: TemplatePlazza Team
mosinstall.description:
This module will display CB User Thumbnails with various option (to be configured in the back-end) :

  1. Latest Profile Book - Requires CB_profile Book installed
  2. Dispay Random User
  3. Latest Registered Users/li>
  4. Latest User Login
  5. Most Popular User - Based on user profile hits
  6. Latest Updated Profile
  7. Dispay Online User
  8. Connection - Will display user thumbnails that has connection with you + Request/Revoke/Remove Connection link (depends on available connection) when you visit any user profile page.
  9. Latest Upload RS Gallery 2 - Requires RSGallery2 installed
  10. Latest Upload Pony Gallery - Requires Pony Gallery
This module will attract your user attention to click other user profile and encourage them to be more active in the website
